headline: AbbVie buys into PD-1/VEGF sweepstakes; Alnylam and Vertex set expectations
summary: AbbVie is paying $650 million for a dual-targeting immunotherapy from China’s RemeGen. Elsewhere, Alnylam missed an earnings target and the FDA flipped its position on a cell therapy from Atara.
